diaryEntries.content:
there comes a point in your life
where the past is so far and distant
vauge and distorted
almost as unknown as the future

and this detachment from one's past
means freedom from old chains
whatever that may mean to you
this freedom is a chance for difference
real difference in one's mind and character

but that same freedom could quickly get you lost
lost between what have happened and what's yet to come
it could take away from you any sense of identity

and between the two
being a slave to the past and totally lost
there's a thin line
a line that separates normality from madness

never believe it's your choice to walk on either sides

how bitter it is
To realize that you are like every body else
Not free

diaryEntries.title: خطبة
diaryEntries.content:
خطبة لا ينتبه لها أحد
جدال بين فلاسفة بائدة
صدام بين معتقدات
وشعارات فقدت حماسها
بداخلي صخب يملأ الأذهان ولا يغني العقول
بداخلي حوار دائم
أسترسل فيه إلى زوالي
أسترق منه بعض العبارات
أحاول أن أضعها في سياق
لا أجد له أول من آخر

but it broke my heart
you can still see me walking and talking
marching forward to the inevitable
but there's nothing there

diaryEntries.title: مُشاهد
diaryEntries.content:
كعجوز خدر
فقد قدرته على الحركة
يشاهد بحسرة كل مآسي الزمان
يشهد الأيام تسلبه شبابه
وأحلام الفتى
وبراءة الأطفال
وفراق يسرق أحبابه
وعلل تنهش الجسد
بكل وحشية ولامبالاة
تُجهز عليه الليالي
وتنفذ الطعنات ليلة بعد أخرى
لا يمكنه الصراخ
ولا طائل من الاحتجاج
ولا حتى الصمت
فقط يمكنه أن يشاهد كل ذاك
برضوخ

تكفي بضع دقائق من المشي
ليدرك المرء أشياء كثيرة عن ذاته
تكفي بضع خطوات أن تكشف لك كم تريد البقاء
وعن مدى حذرك وحرصك
تكفي بضع خطوات أن تكشف لك عن مننتهاك
وعن ضآلتك 
وتكفي بضع أخرى
للنسيان
فقط
عليك أن تكمل الخطى

diaryEntries.content:

عام بأكمله انقضى

تصفعني السنة تلو الأخرى

متى سُلبت مني الأيام

ليلة بعد أخرى

أستجلب الماضي
لأتكبد البقاء في الحاضر

أخشى أن يختلس أحدهم النظر
وانا غير منتبه
فيراني

diaryEntries.title: no need to rush
diaryEntries.content:
you don't have to hurry
there's no need to rush
drink that last sip of coffee
catch your breath
there's no need to rush
you will get to do it again
so there's no need to rush
watch your steps
walk steadily
you will not get there in time any way
so there's no need to rush
you're never gonna finish your work
so there's no need to rush
you will never have enough time
so there's no need to rush
it's gonna end before you know it
So there's no need to rush
you will never reach that heigh
os there's no need to rush
you'll never get enough
you'll never have enough
so there's no need to rush

I take no pride in being just another fool
I take no pride in being just a simple man
I take no pride in going all the way
I take no pride in losing it all
I take no pride in watching them suffer by the day

diaryEntries.title: لازلت أتلعثم
diaryEntries.content:
من بضع سنين مضت
كنت أشد خجلاً
وأكثر انطوائاً
بل وكنت أحيانا أتلعثم
لم أكن واثقاً بعد من خُطاي
كأي شاب
كنت غارقاً في بحر الاختيارات
عندما كنت أقابل آخرين
دائما ما كنت أشعر
أني لست شبيها بهم بعد
كان ترددي بمثابة انتظار
لم أقرر بعد
كيف تكون استقاماتي
وكيف تنتظم مشيتي
وأي من الأخطاء سأرتكب
لم أقرر بعد
أي المعتقدات أهجر
وبأي أملٍ أتشبث
كنت أمام محيط دامس
خائفاً من هوله
وطامعاً في موجه
أما الآن
لطمني الموج
وابتلعني التيه
أصبحت عالقاً بالكثير من الحماقات
وأفكار مفرغة
ورصاصات نافذة
سلكت طريقاً ملتف
لا تدرك أوله من آخر
ولا يصل لأي مرسى

وانا أهيم وسط كل ذاك
يجول بخاطري
ليتني لازلت أتلعثم
ولم تثقل خطاي

createdAtLocation.address: Ibn Al-Haytham, Second New Cairo, Cairo Governorate, Egypt

diaryEntries.title: احتجاج الصمت
diaryEntries.content:
لم يأبه بك العالم
فأحجبت عنه
سذاجة منك ظننت أن يُعيرك أحدهم الانتباه
بعد صمتك الاحتجاجي
تصفعك الأيام بمرارة الواقع
الكل غارقون
لن يأبه بك أحدهم
لا يستطيع أيا منا إنقاذ نفسه
ف ما بالك بالآخرين
تقبلت الأمر، حاولت الخروج عن صمتك
للأسف، لم تعد لكلماتك الآن أي صدى
أنت في طيات النسيان
كعجوز غربت عنه الدنيا
ف أمسى ينتظر -بقلة حيلة- قدره المحتوم

diaryEntries.title: لصوص
diaryEntries.content:
البعض يسرق منك مالاً
أحدهم يسرق منك امرأة
وآخر يسرق منك فُرصة
منهم من يسرق منك ضحكة
أو راحة البال
ومنهم من يسرق منك ساعة!

الكل هنا لصوص
محتال يسرق منك الأيام
وخسيس يسرق منك الأمل

لولا قسوة الليالي
ما قبلت بتلك الوضاعة
ولا صرت من أولئك الأوغاد

diaryEntries.title: بكاء
diaryEntries.content:
أحدهم يبكي بالصراخ
وآخر بالصمت
أو التأمل في الفراغ

البعض يبكي على ما فات
وآخر يبكي من الآت

البعض يبكي حزناً
وآخرهم يبكي غضباً

البعض يبكي رثاء
والآخر يبكي امتناناً

البعض يبكي تيه
والبعض يبكي وحدة

وأنا أريد البكاء بشتى الطرق
بالصراخ والصمت
بالدموع وبصلابة

أبكي على ما فقدت
وما لم أمتلك يوماً

diaryEntries.content:
Dad, we haven't talked for a while
and I feel bad about that
it's been the case for our relation anyway and there's nothing new about it
I just wanted to tell you
how grateful I for all of it
and thank you for it
despite all the anger of adolescence
despite all the small talks and bit of hatred fueled by the limited ability to change anything
despite the lack of emotion
life is a bitch and it's really a wonder how you can keep your sanity all the way
And for that thank you

diaryEntries.title: أنصاف أشعار
diaryEntries.content:
أكتب لأحاكي الأشعار
بكلمات ركيكة وأبيات غير منظومة
أكتب ترجمات عقلٍ مضطرب
أكتب لإفضاء سري
وإرضاء كبريائي
أنظر لنقوش عالحجر
لا أدرك معناها
لكن أعيي كيف يتسنى لإنسان أن يحفر بيدين باليتين حتى أن يُدمي
فقط ليقول "كنت هنا"
حتى لو لم تُقرأ قط من قبيل آخر
فقط يكفي أن تترك أثراً
يُرضي ضئالتك أمام هذا الكون 
أكتب لأفضي لمسودة لا تجرح كبريائي
أكتب لتوثيق ما قد كان
وما كان ممكناً أن يكون
أكتب لأبكي وأتماهى
أكتب لأصرخ وأصمت في آنْ واحد
أكتب لأروي قصصاً لن يتسنى لي حكايتها
أكتب لضعفي وإصراري
أكتب لأحلام لم تتعد عالم الخيال
وأوهام كاذبة
أكتب لذكريات بائدة
واعتذارات لن يتسن لي تقديمها
أكتب لشاعرٍ وئد فور ميلاده
وطفلٍ دُفن قبل بلوغه
وشابٍ شاب قبل آوانه
أكتب وأكتب
وما تكفيني الكلمات عزاء

diaryEntries.title: تراچيديا
diaryEntries.content:
يتسنى لكلٍ منا أن يُفضي بتراجيديته
أحدهم بنظرة
وآخر بالصراخ
أحدهم بقصيدة
وآخر بالخراب
أحدهم بروايات وقصص
وآخر بالصمت
أحدهم بالبكاء
وبعضهم بالرقص
أحدهم بالاحتجاج والتمرد
وآخرٌ بالانصياع
وكثيرهم، بالبقاء
أحدهم بمقطموعة ملحمية
وآخر بالإنصات
يتسنى لكلٍ منا، ولو لوهلة، بالانهيار
كلٌ بطريقته الخاصة
وقدرته المحدودة
ستجد في كل صورة، في كل حالة
تراچيديتها الخاصة

diaryEntries.title: هل يمكن؟
diaryEntries.content:
هل يمكن إصلاح ما أفسدته بعض النزوات
والقليل من الذلّات
هل يمكن إصلاح ما أفسدته
كثرة التساؤلات
وحيرة العقل
وقلق النفس
والمعتقدات البائدة
وتعصب أحمق
وهروب بلا ملجأ
هل يمكن إصلاح ما أفسده ذهاب الأحباب
هل يمكن إصلاح ما أفسده الماضي
وقلق المستقبل
والحنق على الحاضر
هل يمكن ترك البارحة في طي النسيان
فقط، هل يمكن؟
أخبروني، تكفيني الإجابة
لا داعي للقلق
لن أحاول -كباقي الحمقى- محاولة إصلاح أيا من ذلك

diaryEntries.title: أتجوّل
diaryEntries.content:
أتجول حول بنايتي
طريقتي المفضلة في إمضاء القليل من الوقت بعُزلة كافية
لأتجول بشوارع هادئة
يعبرها آخرون مروراً خافتاً
يسمح لي بالترنّح في الطُرقات
أتجوّل عبر بعض الذكريات
وأعبر بمعتقدات بائدة
أمر بحَجرات الأفكار
أفكار ما عادت لي وأخرى سألفها بعد حين
وأبحث وسط الأزقّة عن عزاء
أتجوّل بفرضيًة عن مساري
أغوص في بحر الخيال
أنتبه أني ما عُدت في مساري الصحيح
أحاول أن أتذكًر
من أين أتيت ولأين أذهب
أفترض مرة بعد أخرى
تشابهت البنايات واستحالت الطُرق
لقد مررت من هنا للتو
بل جئت من هُناك
لا بأس، سأكمل السير
حتما سأصل وجهتي
حتى لو فقدت الأثر
فقط، يمكنني مواصلة بالسير
أستيطع أن أقرع أحد الأبواب
بقليل من الحذر والكثير من الأمل
علّ أحدهم يفتح لي
"عفواً، لم أقصد إزعاجكم، خاطئاً ظننت أن هذه بنايتي"
"لا عليك، ربما تشابهت عليك الطرقات"
حتماً سيكون رده بلطف
لم لا؟ لم أسيء لهم
بل وربما يستضيفني أحدهم من حُسن لباقتي
أو يُلح عليّ بالانتظار حتى اتأكد من وجهتي
ولربما تُعجبني جلستهم فأبقى
ما الضير من إمضاء أمسية برفقة أحدٍ غير عقلي الثرثار؟
قد أمُسي عندهم لأصبح آخراً
أستيقظ فأتفقّد المرآة
للحظات، تستوقفني خاطرة
لقد تبدّلت ملامحي حتى استحال استحضار أي صورة عما سبق
لا أملك من ذاتي غير ما أرى الآن
لا تُسيء فهمي، بالطبع أريد العودة لمنزلي
لم أكن ناقماً على وجودي
لكن ذللت للخيال ورأيتني في حيوات أخرى
رأيتني آخرا وتمنيت أن أبقى


حتماً سأتذكّر مقصدي وأستدّلُ على الطريق
أكمل السير
أتجول بدون وجهة محددة
أشعر أني اقترب
بنايات مكررة وهموم متشابهة
هلكت قدماي، أريد العودة
حتماً أقترب
قتلت الشك تلك المرة
عرفت الطريق
فقط الآن، أدركت كيف اختلطت عليُ الأمور
وضحت الطُرق وعرفت مساري
أنعطف وأنظر يساراً
هاهي بنايت..
يا للحماقة! أجدها يميناً
لم أعد أستطع نسج الأفكار
وصلت بدون أن أدرك كيف ساقتني قدماي
كل تفاسيري باتت خاطئة
وصلت لكن أمسيت ضالاً أكثر من ذي قبل
سأتجول غداً، حتماً سأصل بنايتي

createdAtLocation.address: Ibn Al-Haytham, Second New Cairo, Cairo Governorate, Egypt

diaryEntries.title: 25 nov 2019
diaryEntries.content:
the only thing that keeps me running
is the sole reason that I have wanted stop long time ago
I have came to the conclusion that stopping all the hussle that life requires is as logical as any other action, if not more
but for some reason
I have regarded THAT stopping as a defeat
a personal defeat
which is to me worse than other kinds of defeat
so I have kept running
for the sole purpose of rejecting that defeat
and most probably I will keep that mentality for the same reason
days and nights are slipping away
memories are fading
chasing the eventual end

createdAtLocation.address: Ibn Al-Haytham, Second New Cairo, Cairo Governorate, Egypt

diaryEntries.title: what do you see?
diaryEntries.content:
Tell me, what do you see?
look deep and tell me
a tortured soul trapped in a body?
a frightened kid still not realising how things turned out the way they are
a troubled mind with a lot to think of but not much to say
sleepless nights and a lonely bed
a wretched man or a wise sage
what do you see? Now please tell me
I seek your answer, not to compare it to another
I seek an answer because of the lack of one
because I can't see properly anymore
I am lost between shattered mirrors
all images are nothing but a distortion
a distortion so twisted you might think the original is deformed
now, tell me sir
what do you see?
perhaps I find some condolences in your answer
perhaps it gives me a bit of relief
perhaps, you might find your answer

diaryEntries.title: years of deception (25th Aug.  2018)
diaryEntries.content:
knowing the fact that you can't know everything, you can't learn everything there is to learn, you can't memorize everything and you can't connect all the dots because of your limited time and mind capabilities forces you into a situation where you have to adapt to being ignorant for the most part.

But since your ego won't accept that; you start to gather some data, to read some books, watch some movies, talk to people and listen to different stories..  just enough bits of information that your mind can "train" on.
And you keep doing that, gathering data and perceiving the world until you reach a certain point, a critical amount of knowledge that leads you into believing that you have it, you see the world for what it is, you get what others don't, you have a sufficient amount of wisdom to get you by.

But then you catch your mind going through this process of learning and making general assumptions and big conclusions based on very few actual facts. you realize that you are just another pseudointellectual, a mumble rapper, a fish in the sea, then you start seeing it in most people, nobody knows what they are talking about.

That's it, that's the trick. You don't have to know everything, you just have to know enough to bullshit your way through life. Bullshitting people that you get it, you understand what they say, their feelings and even their unspoken thoughts, that you can connect with them even though you don't.

Bullshitting yourself that this is your design, that you are in control, that your beliefs are your beliefs not just some bullshit fed to, that you are genuine not just another broken record of the same screams and dreams. Whether through genetics or religion, you can convince yourself that something is actually true, justify whatever you need to your mind, create whatever meaning you want.
You just have to know enough to bullshit yourself.👍

diaryEntries.title: video game
diaryEntries.content:
I regard life as another version of modern video games
some play just to complete the story
to reach its end and have the blessing of a closure
to be able to visualize the whole story as a drama and be proud of having a part in it

others play to gain points, upgrade their skills to be as powerful and omnipotent as possible

some could balance both

but to me
the main part of a game is just doing the same repetitive task over and over again
whether it's fighting the bad guys
or help building something
adding any contribution to an even bigger progress
it doesn't matter
because it all sums up to doing those trivial and repetitive tasks
how boring!
and you can play so long that you forget what the bigger picture was
what the story was
what may happen afterwards
and it comes to a point where all of that doesn't matter as long as you focus on completing your current task

and that's how I see life
as a meaningless and almost endless journey of tasks
of missions and goals
that leads to some place
to end some story
To finish a bittersweet symphony
but the story is of no importance
the points don't matter anyway
all that matter is to enjoy your current task
because at the end
that is all you get

diaryEntries.content:
في مقتبل شبابي
كنت أغتاظ من الشيوخ كبار السن
كيف لهم بهذا القدر من الهدوء
ماذا يخفي عن هؤلاء الملاعيين حتى يتحلوا بهذه السكينة
كنت أرى الحياة لُغز أبحث عن حله
المستقبل قلق دائم
كيف أخرسوا اسئلة العقل وحيرة النفوس
كيف ارتضوا لأنفسهم ما ارتضوا
دون تمرد أو اعتراض
كيف وأنهم أقرب للمجهول عن غيرهم
كيف وأنهم يدركوا الهاوية التي يترقبها الجميع
اللعنة عليهم وعلى حقيقة الحياه
حتما سأدركها انا بذاتي

أمشي في دربٍ مجهول الوجهة
اختبار لفقدان التظاهر بالتعقل
اختبار لنفاذ الصبر وما تبقى من الأمل
اختبار لاختبار قدرتك على التحمل

قتلني القلق حينها
ويقتلني تدبر الأمر الآن
كنت أسعى وراء سراب
ما من لغز سيفي حله بالغرض
ولا من مخدر يُنسيك القلق
فقط هنالك شجاعة الصمت
وتلك ليست شجاعة الجندي المضحي
من يرمي بنفسه للتهلكة من أجل السمو
فتلك حماقة غلبت غريزة البقاء من منظوري الأناني
لكن كشجاعة محكوم عليه بالإعدام
يقف وحيدا مع سجّانه
في غرفة لا يُرى منها شيء
لا كاميرات هنا
ولا أحد يُشاهد
لن ينفع الصراخ ولا النحيب
لا الترجي ولا الأمل
لا الاعتذار  ولا الندم
فقط شجاعة التحلي بالصمت
لا عزاء له إلا في الصمت
حتى عندما كانت تصرخ كل الظروف بالجنون
لا عزاء له إلا أنه لم يكن الضجيج المحتم

diaryEntries.title: deterioration
diaryEntries.content:

I can only see life as a deterioration process
everything slips away
time, friends and family
your high hopes and even the memory of them
I cannot see but wrinkles all over my face
I look at fire but I only see the ashes
 
and someday when you feel awakened
when you are alert to the fact that it all slips away
you wonder what's left of life
what's left of you

I never made peace with death and I never will
I look away but it's staring at me

diaryEntries.title: relate
diaryEntries.content:
one can never truly feel the hardships of others unless they experience something similar
expressions like "i understand the position you are in" or "i can relate" are nothing but empty lies
it's only by feeling you get to grasp what another person maybe experiencing
it's only by experiencing it yourself you come to feel it
the shock
the awe
the tragedy
the loss
the confusion
the horror
the sadness
the isolation
the mystical
the pain
the agony
the cries
the screams
the hope amidst the void
it's only by experiencing you come to be modest about how you may never be able to understand or relate
how you may never be able to help

diaryEntries.title: 3 aug 2019
diaryEntries.content:
I like to entertain my mind analysing the analogy between life and trips and vice versa
when you are tripping, you can see clearly how your life consists of cyclic patterns
whether it's your daily routines or even psyche state
it's always some kind of a loop that repeats itself once reached its peak
peaks and valleys
it's even very occasional to experience all of these roller coaster ups and downs multiple times throughout a single trip
and each time, you see yourself going through the same loop
exploration, familiarity, realisation and finally adaptation/forgetting which throws you back to square one
these loops become hellish to experience again and again
you think it's madness to go through anything twice
obsessing over such idea could turn your trip into a real nightmare

but when you are not tripping
that's where the vice versa part comes in
when you spend enough time in life to realize it's nothing but another long exhaustive trip
which simply consists of the three known stages of a trip
come up, peak and comedown
death is nothing but a an end to this trip
and just like any trip that goes unplanned
you may spend your entire come up trying to plan how to enjoy your peak to the maximum
if you try so hard you will miss the whole point of it
and spend the comedown trying to rest from such exhaustive exercise
such trips makes you very anxious
time passes and you have no control over it
neither on anything else for that matter
gradually you learn to stop fighting it
and let go of your urge to control
you just have to accept not being in control
to accept the fact that this trip no matter how long it lasts
it is coming to an end
because that is how it always has been
during the trip you need to be as light as possible
in the sense of letting go of dreams and regrets

one trip at a time
one day at a time
gradual progress towards nothing

diaryEntries.title: ساخر
diaryEntries.content:
لماذا يبكي الإنسان؟
يا للسُخفِ أن تواجه شدائد الحياه بالنحيب
كحصن حصين أخُفي دموعي
ما الفائدة في الاعتراف العلني بضعفنا جميعاً؟
كم أرفق لحالكم أيها الوضعاء
كم أبكي لحالي وأسخر منكم

detachment is an ongoing process
it happens to every one while growing up
some of us get distracted from such fact
others realise it
how different and far away you are from who you think you are?
and it hits each one differently
and the biggest detachment is that from your childhood
the oldest and innocent image of a person
the one that we keep seeking for as long as we live
and each one treats this realisation of detachment differently
some admits it and tries to live with what they currently are
some live in denial and think they are still relevant to what they used to be

and my trick is you can play along but never believe it
you can imitate what you think you are
but never forget the reality of you compared to the concept of you

diaryEntries.title: 12 jul 2019
diaryEntries.content:
the ecstasy of fantasy

when you spend enough time in a lucid-dream-like state
simulating some of the infinite possibilities
the could have been
exploring other probable realms
imagining parallel timelines
shaping different memories

after such a long exhausting stimulating mind practice
even if you don't remember all the details of your simulation;
you still feel you have gained something
captured a new sensation, a new thought, a new experience!

and when you practice this long enough
you may think you can hold the infinite in your hands
as if there is more to this mediocre life
as if there are whole other realms you can visit
even if they are imaginary, even if they exist only for fractions of seconds in the back of your little brain

it is still an ecstasy that you can get on

diaryEntries.title: مساء هاديء
diaryEntries.content:
اقترح أحدهم أن نذهب مشياً
لا أذكر لما وافق جميعهم على هذا الاقتراح
ولا أذكر أين كانت وجهتنا
لكني أذكر ذاك المساء الهاديء
كيف اصطحبني أبي في تلك الليلة
وكأي طفل لم يفقد بعد حماسته لهذه المسيرة
روحت أستبقهم بضع خطوات
أتوق شوقاً لأن نصل وجهتنا وأن أكون أول الحاضرين
لما أكن أسترق السمع ولم أهتم بما قيل
لكني أذكر أبي محادثاً عمي وجدي
أضواء الشارع خافتة
أصوات السيارات متباعدة
والنسيم يأسرك

لم نعتد هذه المسيرة
لم تكن فريدة من نوعها
لكني أذكرها
أذكر ذاك المساء
وأذكر أني حينها شعرت بشيء غريب
لم أكن أدرك بعد ماهيته
لكن أدركت أنه شعور نادر يجب تقديسه

مرت الأيام والسنون
غادر الأب
سافر العم
ومات الجد
واندثر الطفل
يوم مات جدي، تذكرت هذه الأمسية
أدركت حينها أن ذاك الشعور مرتبط كلياً بذكراه
مرت أكثر من عشر أعوام منذ وفاته
حدث بها ما يكفي أن يُنسيني اسمي
فقدت ما قد أدعوه ذاتي
نسيت اسمي وهويتي
تناسيت العالم
لما تعد ذكرى جدي حاضرة في ذهني
تركت الأموات ليتركني الموت
تناسيته لينساني ولو لبضع سنين أو حتى أيام

لكن، ما إن حضر النسيم العليل مرة أخرى
تذكرت تواً تلك الأمسية
وأمسيت أسيراً لماضي لم يبق منه سوى ذاكرتي المضطربة عنه
كان موته بمثابة أول زلزال لثوابت الطمأنينة
أدركت حينها أن الحياه لم تعد كما كانت
الحياه عطيّة مسلوبة
أيام مرهونة
لم أبك عند سماعي الخبر
لكني مازلت مذعوراً من هذا الشعور
أنظر لأبي
أخشى أن تسرقه الأيام
اتأمل وجه أمي
تعلق الكلمات بحلقي
أريد أن أبكي

diaryEntries.title: inception
diaryEntries.content:
a long car ride and I am driving
is it 180Km/hr? 200?
who cares?
this is crazy
every passing minute feels like forever
oh those last seconds
I should have slow down
Maybe but who cares
this is a moment free of fear
this is to let go
woke up, sitting next to a friend
what a mad world I was in
I must have been tripping
was it an old nightmare
hello friends of mine
oh how grateful I am it was just a bad dream
right?
eyes are worried
eyes never lie
I can see they are hiding something
what is it? I ask
I sit in silence
I look up
oh what a dream
how many times would I fall into this
it's obvious but it just occurred to Me
but I cannot remember
Did I hurt anybody?
but I don't remember
Did I cause any pain?
oh this guilt is eating me Alive
this must be hell on earth
so it's true, I did hit someone on the road
we did crash into something
people got hurt
I was reckless and I had it coming
the fear that always haunted me got true
you get what you deserve
but I don't remember
so it wasn't just a bad dream?
oh, what a fine line between reality and dreams

no line at all I dare say
so are the police coming?
No? Someone else got framed for it?
someone sacrificed to be the lamp?
but why? am I worthy of such sacrifice?
so I have to carry crime and guilt without redemption
oh where shall I run
I am getting back from school
oh the good old days
oh friends whom I don't remember but seem familiar
and I am walking back home
this short walk to my home
probably that was my favorite part in the day
that dangling walk that gives me enough time to think about what happened today
the joke that made us laugh the most
how breathless we got running from him
the girl I look into her eyes briefly and had the wildest thoughts
and tomorrow, whom I should walk into tomorrow
the jokes I want to tell again
and I am walking
but I lost my shoes
I remember taking them off to cross the siege
when did I get into this garden anyway?
Where am I going, I cannot remember
but I keep walking
why do I keep getting into these friends of mine
what got you here? i ask
why do you look worried? i ask
it so suspicious down here
but I am searching for my shoe
I must find it
and I am walking tormented by this guilt
how couldn't I know?
I had this doubt while driving, right?
I thought I am in a dream
the doubt killed me
that's why I kept driving like crazy
How couldn't I know that it wasn't a dream?
and this is what I get for not being able to tell the difference
this is my reality now 
To Live with the guilt of killing someone I don't even know
oh I weep
I must weep
may it cleanse my soul
But then I wake up

but the lost is real

diaryEntries.title: 22 june 2019
diaryEntries.content:
I wonder if this is the final version of me
the stressed out
who just needs a bit of rest but never gets it
who is always trying to get more but never gets enough
who has great plans but now is never the time
who looks at people and wonder
who lives in the lies of potential
who looks at his present as a memory
who is deceived that there is more to him than what meets the eye
who considers life as a game of choices but never choose wisely
who is cynical all the time even though cynicism never gets him anywhere
who looks in the mirror and can't believe that this image is what others see
that this face should be a reflection of self
that this is what's left

diaryEntries.title: the present
diaryEntries.content:
a stoic would say
let go of the past and the future
the past is no more
the future that hasn't been yet is not worthy of worry
you only have the present moment which stands to be deprived
and it's true
you cannot disagree with such statement

yet that stoic forgets about one's own memory
or denies its power
one's own string that connects their countless days an nights
one's own torment

come to think of it
one's own memory is what make this life a bitter sweet symphony

people are forgetful by nature
but you can never really expect how a memory can haunt you
no matter how far away it seems

how can you really forget about what makes you who you are as it never was
how can you never worry about what's yet to come

it's true that life is nothing but a short moment
the now that you live in
but yet a moment encapsulates all of it
a moment is nothing but all of life

To be contempt where you are in life

about us
about life

she always forgets, my mother
she has every right to
I cannot even help it at this young age of mine

so, she usually tells me the same stories over and over again

but now, I don't tell here
I just listen to them stories all over again
trying to memorize every bit of them

trying to keep her face in my head
to hold her smile, her laugh
her kindred spirit
her childish innocence

diaryEntries.title: about death
diaryEntries.content:
why can one stand the idea of living forever?
a fantasy that seems intuitively preferable at the first glance
but when deeply processed as reality would turn out to be another hell
would someone stand repeating their cycles with no end?
no matter how favourable some lives and cycles may seem over the others
and no matter how many different ways of living one can think of
once these ways and methods are destructed to their simple patterns
and processed over and over again
these loops come to be unbearable at some point
no matter how patient and satisfied a person may be in their being as is
they would eventually get fed up
who can fathom doing the same thing over an over again
the human psyche is always hungry for change
always waiting for it
Anticipating its eventuality
in a way, one can look at it
as humans are awaiting their death
their eventual end and last change
but what happens after that?
another infinite awakening? wouldn't that be the same as the unimaginable situation of living forever?
and if that so, what is it that we are waiting for then?
an actual end? an absolute silence of the mind
is that what we really seek behind all those temporary desires?

a struggle to end the struggle
a struggle to keep going
a struggle you have to cherish as long as you still can push forward

diaryEntries.title: anarchist
diaryEntries.content:
I have always been rebellious
deep down, that defined me as a character facing different situations
I wanted to break all the rules
defy all sacred
burn all books
demolish all the pillars
to be a true anarchist
to be an anarchist is to be free
to accept chaos and what comes with it
not to be held by anything

And I imagined that this is who I will grow to be
it may take long
after several battles and bruises
but someday, I will be truly free from all kinds of chains human beings wholeheartedly accept

little did I know about my self

I grew up to find myself quite the opposite
to find myself following the rules in order to gain some independence and individuality that may help me be the anarchist I wanted to be, but later
in fact, for the most time I am a very disciplined being
I do what I ought to do when I should do it
of course, with the believe that I am the one who is making myself do it
I am free to choose and that's my choice
and it's true, I can stop being disciplined anytime I want
but to what end? what purpose would it serve?
being an outlier doesn't help very much in a community
it makes things difficult for a person

I grew up to find the anarchist in me defeated
I found that willingly doing what you want to do is a more challenging task to the self
and maybe even more beneficial for your survival

there's still a bit of flame of chaos inside that I care about keeping
you have to go mad once in a while to keep sane

you can only move be engaging yourself in different activities to always feel like experiencing what we do for the first time
to re explore what we already did and will do once more
that's why we tend to take those breaks and stops
to be able to have a new chapter again
to regain any sense of excitement we once had

diaryEntries.title: dead veins
diaryEntries.content:
as I wash my hands
I look at my veins and how colourful  they are
the red and greenish vessels that carry the essence of life
a true manifestation of what it means to be alive
and I cannot help but think that those very alive veins will someday turn dark and cold
what a depressing recurring thought I cannot run from even while doing such simple thing as washing my hands
"I wish I could be alive for eternity"
I say to myself, as any foolish kid would think to themselves
but I am not a kid anymore
and I have processed this thought million times
and even entertained the thought that what if we could live forever
what would it cost God?
what would it cost the laws of nature?
it's maddening that it's what it is
then I have realised that even that must be hell
life would then feel like an endless loop that you cannot run from
it would turn into the biggest prison one can be in
because that would be it
the human mind gets bored of everything, not matter what it is
give yourself enough time doing a certain thing and you'll eventually be sick of it
repetition could be the worst hell of all

and that's the bitter sweetness of life
we appreciate it because it comes to an end
an absolute end
yet this eventuality haunts us along the way

diaryEntries.title: free?
diaryEntries.content:
am I free?
at this age and status
after the different activities I have participated in
after various ways of spending time
am I actually free?
is any of us?
we accept roles in society that we don't like
the feel imposed on us by the conditions we find ourselves in
so, each one tries to make the best of it
by submitting to this role and burden of responsibilities expected by the society from you
in the hope of having time for oneself at some point
so, you waste most of your day
sucked up in an unfavourable routine
in the hope of finally having a couple of hours each day
to have a peace of mind
finally after doing all that work and fulfilling the absolute ridiculous duties assigned to you
finally you can be in your mind palace
to tase that sense of freedom
some choose to spend such time
-spare time as it's called-
pursuing sensual pleasures
enriching one's mind
catching one's breath
having a moment of silence
a moment of appreciation, of inhaling life in
praying to some god
listening to some guru
healing
whatever it's that you do
you spend those few hours of so called free time
trying to catch up with what you actually may have wanted to do
with what you may have been

but you're actually free to do go all the way
you can only have these little sparks of pleasure
then you have to go back to the unbearable routine as part of the machine
the aimlessly moving towards nothing machine of life

all you rebellious act won't stand for long
discipline is a part of life
some of has the fortune to be disciplined for less time than others

Yet, no one is totally free
as long as you have to survive
and follow the rules of the game
even if it's for a small part of your time
you cannot be truly free

no I am not free
yet I am seeking to have a little more freedom than before

diaryEntries.content:

each character have one or more arc
a character arc is simply the closure for their development from on persona to another
from a specific set of characteristics to another
through a journey of dynamic environments and different reasons for a character to gain or lose one of their characteristics

and if you look at your past
you should be able to identify precisely your different arcs
analyse them thoroughly

and when I did so
I could see how different my arcs where
how much I have changed from here to there to nothing
and U think to myself,
whatever I have become to be

don't I owe the past versions of me anything?

diaryEntries.title: old smoker
diaryEntries.content:
I saw an old man the other day
standing, steadily and slowly taking out a cigarette
carefully finding his lighter
finally lighting his cancer stick
strenuously smoking
looking out in all sorts of direction
as if someone to catch him
strenuously burning it to ashes
and then slowly returning back to his car seat
oh, what a damn fool this old man is
smoking in that age and condition
does not he have any regard to his suffering?
how could he still be that hungry for a smoke?
what a sinful desire that may be
shameful desire to self-destruct
but am I any different?

does it matter when you stop being sinful?
every second is a chance?
but is it any different than previous ones?
than the ones to come?
can one's current condition be of any excuse to one's choice?
isn't one's life but a continuous string?
so one's past, present and future is all but one moment

realising I have been prisoned by my mind

diaryEntries.title: through my ill mind
diaryEntries.content:
i got a disease but they never knew what to call it
I am not paying enough attention to this world
I see you talking but I am not listening
I look at you but I see nothing
I might even be talking but I mean nothing
my words are of no value to me
I care none about debating this world
I see blood all around me but I feel nothing
I kept screaming my lungs out
can hear nothing but silence
she's begging me to stay but I already left
he's telling me she's dead so I laughed about it
we're burying him underground but I shed no tears
dad is shouting at me
he must be mad at something
mom is crying beside him
why did she get so sad all of a sudden?
it doesn't matter
when did he got so fat?
that guy on the TV looks funny
when did it get so hot in here?
the clock's ticking is so loud
was it always that loud?
the lights are defiantly brighter today
how many times a normal person flinch in a given minute?
am I flinching more or less?
how normal I am?
how close I am to the average person?
how solid are the statistics we have?
how much do you trust the work of others?
oh, is he still shouting?
how can he be so loud?
why are these people looking at me?
asking me whether I am fine or not
it's not that drastic after all, right?
alright, I fell of, I can see that
but I am good
oh! these scratches on my hands and legs?
come on guys, it's nothing to worry about
she fell of the 15th?!
it must have been horrible
when was the last time I ate something?
how much weed is too much?
when was the last time I spoke to GOD?
I should make a movie about it
what make a person a genius anyway?
it's nothing but the will to experiment and the stroke of luck
do I still have rollpaper?
these niggas think they're hot shit now
just because they're trending does not mean they stand out
how long have I been rolling a cigg and a half for a joint?
which will kill me faster?
the weed or the tobacco?
will I get sick on my last days or die running as fast as I can get?
where's the lighter?
I always leave it somewhere
Ma, will you stop crying for me?
she was suicidal in her last days?
well, who isn't these days?
I remember my grandfather
walking side by side
he was so funny, wasn't he?
how much do I remember his face?
He had no hair, I am sure of that
I need water, holy water
does drinking cleanse you from your sins?
I wouldn't say no to that
the mind does not shut up
nor those annoying sons of bitches
but I would rather chatter silently instead of begging the world to understand
how bad would it be drink the 4th coffee on a row?
I need to focus
set my priorities straight
since when did that bitch hook with that dude?
he looks gay as hell
oh! I lost three teeth?
that's why I were not able to talk
how did my real teeth look anyway?
I don't have much photos
I don't like smiling in pictures
look where this seriousness got me anyway?
I am standing there
guilty but I feel no remorse
I liked her but I never got to tell her
how much money do I got?
compared to a mil.? Not a lot
how much time is left?
I wanna run but I gotta go to bed
I must finish those dreams before I am dead

diaryEntries.content:
I still get stunned by that subconsciousness of mine
it applies the fundamental concepts
or as I call them
the pillars of my mind palace
to my deepest fears and desires
to direct a semi short movie in the most bizarre and surreal way
last night I dreamt of being at this creepy movie theater
where there are a lot of weird ass people
just floating around
and I am going into this place
talking with some friends
looking at those creepy weirdos
looping through this a couple of times
each with a different group of friends
and a different topic to discuss
to finally
find myself climbing down those stairs
and this creepy guy just looks at me as I am going down
and it is obvious how danger this guy may be
and this loops a couple of times
till my curiosity beats me to listen to what this guy is saying
and finally accepting his suspicious invitation to check the basement downstairs
curiosity, my friend, is gonna kill me someday
and just by going down there
I drown in this viscous cycle of lust and fear
it's a place full of temptation
but be aware of each with its consequence
it gets very bloody and horrendous after that
I should have stayed up there
but it seems that it's rooted inside me to move towards the unkown
the risky but tempting
it seems one can never really learn from their own mistakes
you will forget and fall once again
you already did

diaryEntries.title: lost
diaryEntries.content:
as a kid, I loved acting
I was fascinated by how can a normal person create different personas for themselves
a good actor can get into a character and you wouldn't even notice
a great actor would seamlessly move between characters
I never tried acting, yet it always had its effect on me
maybe I am not a comedian, but I can mimic some of the act
and it would do the job
I noticed this in myself growing up
I noticed how I catch phrases and jokes from different shows
how I catch the looks and voice tone of different actors
how I am almost acting all the time without even knowing it
I didn't pay attention to such fact
"I am just good at acting after all", I thought to myself
by the time I got a little bit older
I realised the consequences of such dangerous play
I lost connection to my identity year by year
I knew this and did not care
each year I would get into new characters
new behaviour and patterns
new identity that is not originally mine nor someone else's
year after year, I became this freak of personalities
a conflicted mind and random thoughts
what I lost over the years is not just an identity
what's more importantly, I lost the sense of having identity
I lost the belief that each one of us is somehow unique in their own way
I lost any will to seek an identity
I accepted the fact that I am freak than cannot grow to something else

diaryEntries.title: lazy
diaryEntries.content:
most people are lazy by nature
their brains are lazy
they don't like new inputs and different variables
a brain likes to get accustomed to things
getting to know things
it makes it easier to interact with a similar previously encountered situation
that's why most of us spend their young years
accepting new variables and inputs to their systems
we have to anyway
till we reach a point where we start picking our preferable standards for life
we stick to them
your favourite circle of friends
your favourite bands and genres
your set of activities and hobbies
your wife, your stable career
more or less your comfort zone
when you get to know things
you get to judge them
to form a perspective about life
a consistent one
what a lazy life one shall lead

But she must realise it

she is just waiting as all of us are
but she is sitting, not running like must of us
Not expecting, she waits in the dark

pick your favorite game
how many times have you lost?
probably a lot, on average it would be almost equal to the number of times you have won
if that is the case, why do you continue playing such a game?
why would you go down the same road to face the same defeat with bitterness
because everybody loses, right?
you are not the only one who lose
most the people do, if not all of them
your lose is not special
that's why you feel okay about it
it is no big deal if it happens to everyone
you are not alone in this
What a shame

diaryEntries.title: a story
diaryEntries.content:
"history is always written by winners."
it is true, what we have at hand is nothing but someone's story
a perspective of what happened
regardless of how fake or true it is
it remains only a single perspective
this applies to you as a vessel of memories
you are nothing but the story you tell
the story you hold on to throughout the days
it doesn't really matter how things go down
what matters is how you tell it
even if it's a fallacy
a story lives, a story remains
a story will replace the actual memory
a story is a painting of words
people spent lifetimes holding on to their fictitious stories
when you tell a story over and over again
it becomes a reality, your reality
it is not possible to rewrite a whole story
you can just manipulate how you tell one
manipulate it just enough to make it reasonable
to make it believable
a twisted story for a dull reality is an alternate reality
a false one
be careful how you tell yours
be aware of your fallacies

diaryEntries.title: transcendence

to stimulate life
to transcend time
in the sense of stimulating progression of everything that surround you
you already see it every day
actual pictures of what life may be in the future
or may have been in the past
you don't have to be very smart to see it and connect the dots
to put those timeframes of life and put it in a sequence
a sequence for your reference that this s what life comes to be

you have to live the later in the now
and you have to keep the now for the later
you have to constantly remind yourself of what yet to be and what has already been

diaryEntries.content:
I never was a hard working person by nature
I do not have enough motives to be
regardless, I needed -like everybody- to succeed
to achieve a set of pre determined goals
I liked the euphoria that comes with it
however short it is, I pursued it
but I had to figure a way of doing things
with the minimal effort possible with the maximum output that I could get
I tried to have it easy
to attain glorified results, you need to put in as much work needed
to me, that is overwhelming
the amount of effort and time needed to achieve something
specially when I do not regard anything is worth the while
so I knew I have to outsmart things
I have to always figure out a shortcut
it became a constant challenge to me
I have to prove to myself that I could win
and however small or big a goal seem to be
once reached, my brain automatically start searching for the next challenge
however irrelevant a goal may be compared to how I imagined life
compared to the path I think I want to lead in life
once this goal proves difficult enough for me
I start chasing it blindly
no matter how drastic the changes that come with such determination with no planning
I keep on running after the fantasy
what a viscous cycle I have fallen into
running on an endless stopping wheel like a hamster
knowing it will never end
exerting all available energy nevertheless
they say times pass, different goals appear
put my foot on the gas, don't care about no peers
and I have reached a state where I have mastered a routine of my reward circuit
I know just the enough amount of dopamine I need to keep going
to move forward without having any regard for second thoughts

diaryEntries.title: manifesto
diaryEntries.content:
am I writing a diary?
Hell. No!
it's more of a personal manifesto
an analysis of the self
a justification for the actions
a manifesto of ideas
a recording of the now
a confession of sins
an admission of guilt
an apology to whom needs it
an observation of the others
a something to hold on to going down the memory lane
a collection of still shots
of the inside of a disturbed brain
a documentation of consciousness
as a collection of thoughts
an un-sent letter to god
to a higher being
for the world to see
for a mother to understand
for myself
for the memory of me

we were wondering on the road
looking for our lost luggage
how could have we missed it?
someone should have noticed
someone should have listened carefully
someone should have begged us to stop and just listen

silenced screams are loudest in my wild dreams

diaryEntries.title: darkness
diaryEntries.content:
poof, the lights are out
and for a brief of a second
you hear nothing, you see nothing
not even a hissing, total darkness
you have no clue of the external world
as close as you can get to a description of the void
nothingness
as if you are a floating consciousness in the no where
what would you do then?
if this what it comes to be
to be truly and utterly lonely
I think to myself that must be
the cruelest punishment for a consciousness
time has no meaning in such hypothetical situation
it can be measured only by occurrences of different events
such experience is abnormal to us
to be in that darkness, that utter void
as if it is for eternity
that is why most of us have this fear of darkness by nature
it only makes sense
as a child, I have had this fear too
it was the biggest fear of my life
I have kept the lights on even when I am asleep
it must be unbearable to be blind
to be reminded of the horrible situation existence can get to
but you can overcome your fear only if you face it
since then, I have tried to not be afraid of such darkness
even more, to experience it fully
to feel the horror of the disappearance
to train the self, my self
to be ready for such existence

diaryEntries.title: monster
diaryEntries.content:
only a schizophrenic person would blame themselves on their past doings

I look in this mirror and examine my face
oh, boy! what a horrible freak I must be
Are those scars mine?
Are those scars as obvious to people as I see them?
am I too anxious about them or am I too blind to see the consequences of my doing?
maybe I did not cry enough
maybe I did not fell into grieve as much as I have should
but why am I giving it attention now?
I surely did not give those scars that much attention back then
so, why now?
if I could suppress when it had way more apparent effect on me
how could it burst now?

but only a schizophrenic person would have the audacity to cry because of their doings
only a schizophrenic mind would separate the actor from the victim
only a schizophrenic soul would feel regret
but a consistent mind
a coherent person
a logical monster
would admit their doings
would accept the consequences
would still choose to carry the burden of being themselves
only a logical freak, like me, would do it all over again

diaryEntries.title: external
diaryEntries.content:
how much interesting am I to the outside world?
a question that each of us have in mind
since we were just kids starting to notice the external
the answer to such question is measured by how much attention you get from the outside world
how responsive your surroundings are to your actions
it's a rooted need in each kid and adult
whether it's realised by the actor or not
it's a need that affects all of a human interactions
it's no shame to have such need
it's not easy to get rid of after all
I realised this early in my teenage years
I have started to observe patterns of behaviour in me and others
that scream "I need attention, please see me"
as if it's a cry for help
and I have hated how pathetic people look
when their actions scream such need
reaching out to others
seeking validation
asking for approval
as if the have no dignity or pride
what a disgusting thing to watch
I thought to myself
since then I have decided to ignore such need
I seek nothing from the outside world
materialistic or none
and it made me the kind of introvert persona I am today
not out of being shy
but out of despise
to the others
to me
to all of this social game we play

diaryEntries.title: mimic
diaryEntries.content:
we as a species are used to mimic
from chimpanzees to rulers of the world
they all mimic movements and strategies
it's by nature that we watch and learn
you watch that comedian and learn how to tell a joke
you read a poem to know how it is to be sad
you listen to a sad song to learn how to be gloomy
you watch others laugh and pick a one
you read about history to learn how the cycle repeats itself
you watch your favourite actor and learn  how to act
you mimic this and copy that
until you have a picture of your own
a combination of others that is yet unique

diaryEntries.title: getting familiar
diaryEntries.content:
life is about getting familiar
getting used to things
the first part of it is about exploration
exploring this material and spiritual world
gaining more knowledge about what life is
what lies ahead
about how your experience shall be
that's why people always root for the beginnings
as they are heavily related with exploring
discovering something new
but the older you become
the more you time spend interacting with this world of ours
the more you get used to it
the less you explore and the more you get used to things
to the once-mind-blowing facts
to the human emotions spectrum
to the people you know
to life with its bitterness or sweetness
most people spend maybe their first 20 years
in the exploring phase
but after that, each gets more stable
more accustomed to their life as it is
getting ready in each phase for what comes after
getting used to the bitter fact of the human destiny
getting used to things is bad after all, right?
it is more comfortable facing what you have already faced before
it is less risky to change your course of actions as long as the prove working
each creates his own routine and live within
almost the same set of repeated actions in the game
and that familiarity to me
is related to stillness
to being slowly dead
I say this while I am on of the very routinic people
Know your cycle
get used to it
repeat till it proves non-worthy
at the same time I can't stop but thinking how paralysing that feels
I have got used to things
To the point that I believe I need a reset button
to remove all what my consciousness came to be
to explore again
which I somehow do once in a while

diaryEntries.title: relations

after a while you can see how pathetic most of human relations are
how maddening it is to see people keep on going through same cycle of abuse and deception
why do anyone keep on of those relationships
then I came to learn that relationships are one big constant to hold on to
a constant for you to reflect on over the years
a constant defines who you are
an affirmation that you
the perception of you
still exits
that's the gist of it
whether it is abusive or not
pathetic or not
it is something to hang on to through this storm of days
people know that
whether by hear or after some thought analysis
it is like an written contract between people to hold on to each other
till they get through with it

diaryEntries.title: no option
diaryEntries.content:
I have always looked at old people and wondered
what keeps them going
what makes you hang on to that life
when its quality is not that good
is not that worthy
there is a fine line in life when it turns to almost no fun
and I thought to myself
I do not to be that old
I will never let that happen to me
I will quit before I turn to that
but as I keep getting older
I realize more each day
that what keeps you going
is that you have no other option
you never had
from the moment you were born
you had only one purpose
and that is to exist
to survive to the next day
no matter how fucked up your last day was
you will wake up the next day
spend most of your time doing the "have-to-do"s
watch yourself die by the drop
grit your teeth and get through it
life ain't but a series of decay
you either sit and watch it
or get busy dying

diaryEntries.title: are you ready?
diaryEntries.content:
life is nothing but getting ready to die.
through the different phases of growing up
you are always getting more hints on how to get ready to die
how to accept such hard fact
it is so obvious
they cannot tell it to your face once your born
childhood is the oblivious state
you know nothing about it
you shouldn't know
you don't think about eternity
you just experience the present as is
that's why we always root to that phase
the beginnings were much simpler
but after that oblivious state
the grown ups start telling you about that inevitable horrible thing
they cannot hide it anymore
a normal reaction to such trauma
waking up to the reality of life
a normal reaction should be to freak out
to scream in agony
but if you start doing that
how are you going to continue the long road ahead till you meet your destiny?
so they start filling your mind with the appropriate distraction
the game of life
the sequence of actions you should take to be a well established person
let it be work, marriage, relationships or any other responsibilities
they all fall under the umbrella of continuous tasks that keep you from thinking about how maddening that inevitability is
but then, you gradually start to grasp that it all fades away
you start to work less
play less
interact less with the game of life
and meditate more about the end
till you reach the last phase
the phase of waiting
when you look at your peers falling one by one
when you got nothing to wonder about except for when is your turn
in that phase you ought to be more stable to really accept it
to take it in with no grudge
after all, you have known it since the beginning

I got nothing against the efficiency of such method to accept the reality of death
after all, it proved to work all those centuries

I once had a grudge against being that hopeless
that desperate
don't we have any other option but to accept it?
no matter how rebellious
how maddened or angry you may get
how afraid or terrified you may be
how courageous or pitiful you are
you still have to accept it
the only rebellious act I could think of is to reject that waiting
that long road ahead
that is the only true choice you can take
to tell the death I am here instead of waiting for him to take his move
but then I asked myself the one question that lies ahead
are you ready?
are you really ready?
my answer back then haven't changed
No, I am not
but I am not willing either to do all that waiting
I have to do it even unwillingly
to gamble that it may work
that I might someday reach a state where I can face death
with no fears
no regrets
no hopes
to face it as I came in
oblivious

diaryEntries.title: abstraction
diaryEntries.content:
usually I think about what life is
with an abstract understanding of what all this is really about
there are some perceptions that I have already constructed about life
needs and desires
hopes and fear
dreams and nightmares
egotistical mania
childhood issues and perspectives
illusions and distractions
forgetting and denial
these abstractions to me are ways to see through life
in order to be more aware of what's important and what's not throughout this journey
to be aware of what you might miss like others do
to finally get the most of this life
but I always come to the conclusion that these abstraction are nothing but mere words
language that was constructed by others
ideas that already hijacked that little brain of mine years ago
ideas that does not belong to me which now influence my understanding of life and the decisions that come after it
so I finally came to this result,
you will get the most of this life when you just perceive it as it is
with no analysing whatsoever
when you, as a player, act as a mere observer with little interaction/resistance possible to what's being perceived
that's the most a human can do to fully experience this life
to be fully immersed in the moment
totally lost in it with no worries about the future
no memory of the past
a complete detachment from concerns and thoughts
and it turns out that this is what I am seeking without acknowledging it
the ultimate ego death
whether it is a trip
or a normal routine
a total loss of sense is fundamental so you can get immersed in the now
thus, a total loss of sense is an eventually
or at least, a risky milestone that's worth the risk

anything

how many dream have I had d forgotten
how many thoughts I had and they vanished after
how many things I thought about saying but never did
how many apologises I have kept to myself
how many melodies I listened to but got no clue about now
How many times I have lived and got no record of

I want to capture these moments
To write about them
not to live in the memory of others
but to prove to myself, to others, to anyone and no one
that, I, once lived
no matter how short it was
how worthless it was
how bitter it was
even for a fraction of a second
that I once existed

diaryEntries.title: manifesto
diaryEntries.content:
I am agitated and angry at myself.
I got myself into a situation where I have to force myself quitting a certain habit for the greater good
people around me may mistake my substance abuse for a spoiled kid behaviour while in fact it's a reaction, a rejection, a childish rebellious act, a form of denial, a mechanism that helped me forget -even for a little bit- about the nagging questions and repeated thoughts your consciousness throws at you
I may sound idiotic but this was my choice; I'd rather live in denial with a foggy mind, confusing days and dates to the point that keeping track of time is pointless, rather than giving into the illusion of purpose, the endless search quest for some answer, for some meaning, for anything for that matter.
I learned how to use drugs as a short term reward to finish the meaningless required daily tasks and routines.
Now that I have to quit; I can't think about something other than how to replace it? how to occupy and distract the mind from the psychoanalysis shit?
how to accept this boredom and stillness once again?
